contentfulProduct.seoDescription: Our waffle sham set is woven from super soft 100% organic cotton that is lightweight and breathable.  The shams feature a traditional honeycomb design on the front and a classic 400TC percale on the reverse.
contentfulProduct.title: Organic Luxe Waffle Shams

content.value:
Our waffle sham set is woven from super soft 100% organic cotton that is lightweight and breathable. The shams feature a traditional honeycomb design on the front and a classic 400TC percale on the reverse. Perfectly hand crafted for aesthetic ease and touchable comfort.
Organic cotton is made without harmful toxins like pesticides or insecticides, making it safer for the farmers who harvest it, the consumers who use it, and the environment.
Set includes two shams
100% organic waffle weave cotton
Reverses to 100% organic 400TC solid cotton percale
Envelope closure
Free of harmful chemicals and toxins
Crafted in Tiruppur, India
Machine wash cool using mild laundry detergent. Do not bleach. Tumble dry low or hang dry. Remove promptly.

productDetails.productDetails:

Our waffle sham set is woven from super soft 100% organic cotton that is lightweight and breathable. The shams feature a traditional honeycomb design on the front and a classic 400TC percale on the reverse. Perfectly hand crafted for aesthetic ease and touchable comfort.


Organic cotton is made without harmful toxins like pesticides or insecticides, making it safer for the farmers who harvest it, the consumers who use it, and the environment.
